alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:40PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Livingston County through 415 PM CDT... At 340 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gridley, or 14 miles southwest of Pontiac, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gridley and Flanagan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
